title: Love Island's Kady McDermott and Yewande Biala step out in stylish ensembles at clothing launch
text:
They are former Love Island stars who have now transformed into Instagram influencers.

And Kady McDermott, 24, and Yewande Biala, 23, stepped out to support another social media star as they attended the Jena Frumes x Primark launch at Restaurant Ours in London on Thursday evening.

Kady looked glam in a black and white animal print mini dress, which she teamed with white knee-high boots, while Yewande opted for a chic all-white ensemble.

Girls' night! Kady McDermott, 24,(eft) and Yewande Biala, 23 (right) attended the Jena Frumes x Primark launch at Restaurant Ours in London on Thursday evening

The star drew the eye to her trim thighs in her ruched mini dress, which boasted a high neckline and long sleeves.

Kady ensured her tan was displayed to the maximum with the help of her white pointed boots and a small top-handle bag.

The brunette beauty styled her long hair extensions into tumbling curls and accessorised with hoop earrings.

Kady accentuated her features with a heavy make-up look, complete with false eyelashes and a deep purple lipstick.

Glam: Kady looked glam in a black and white animal print mini dress, which she teamed with white knee-high boots

Chic: Yewande looked sophisticated in white high-waisted trousers with a sleek kick-flare and a form-fitting white top featuring a halterneck strap attached to one side

Yewande looked sophisticated in white high-waisted trousers with a sleek kick-flare, and boosted her height with perspex stilettos.

Adding a twist to her simple look, the reality star donned a form-fitting white top featuring a halterneck strap attached to one side.

Her long ombré locks were parted in the centre and styled into wet look curls, while false eyelashes and a contoured make-up look added the finishing touched to her look.

Party time: Kady posed with model and influencer Jenna Frumes

Big night: Jenna looked glamorous in a soft pink mini dress and stiletto heels

Kady found TV fame on the ITV2 dating show, where her romance with Scott Thomas kept fans captivated due to their tumultuous rows - including a famous outburst in which she called co-star Tina Stinnes 'a Made In Chelsea reject c**t'.

Since the show wrapped up, her work moved from TV to social media and later cosmetics as she launched her 'By Kady' make-up range.

Last year, she joined the cast of TOWIE as Myles Barnett's girlfriend however their stint on the show was ill-fated following a series of shocking arguments.

This culminated in the tempestuous couple being slashed from the show, however they remained defiant as he branded the programme 'toxic'.

The couple mainly keep their work limited to social media, with the duo littering their respective pages with snaps of their lavish holidays and recent home renovation.

Rise to fame: Kady shot to fame on the 2016 series of Love Island, reaching the final with then boyfriend Scott Thomas

Reconciled: Kady has been dating Myles Barnett since summer 2018 and set up home together earlier this year when they purchased a bungalow to renovate in St. Albans, Hertfordshire

In August, the couple called time on their year-long relationship after an explosive argument, deleting all trace of each other on social media.

And less than a week later, the reality TV pair confirmed they were back on track, with Kady posting a cosy selfie of the duo kissing on her Instagram platform.

Suggesting they are not planning to split again anytime soon, Kady also boasted to her followers that she and her boyfriend are going on a luxurious Pilates retreat to Thailand at the end of November.

The pair have been dating since summer 2018 and set up home together earlier this year when they purchased a bungalow to renovate in St. Albans, Hertfordshire.
description: The ladies looked chic in their monochrome attire as they attended the Jena Frumes x Primark launch at Restaurant Ours in London on Thursday evening
